briefings_2.text: This is a sample DCS World mission created for testing the Miz Editor application. The mission demonstrates text extraction capabilities.

briefings_3.text: Blue coalition objective: Complete all training exercises and return to base safely.

briefings_4.text: Red coalition objective: Defend assigned airspace from enemy incursions.

briefings_5.text: Neutral forces: Observe and report only.

triggers_6.text: Welcome to the training mission. All pilots report to your assigned aircraft.

triggers_7.text: Excellent work! All objectives have been completed. Return to base.

triggers_8.text: Warning: Enemy aircraft detected. All fighters scramble immediately.

radio_9.text: Overlord, Eagle Flight checking in, on station at Angels 25.

radio_10.text: Eagle Flight, Overlord, copy. Maintain CAP pattern and await further instructions.
